body.p: In contrast to the amendments for financial assets and financial liabilities in IFRS 9 (see paragraph 5.4.9 of IFRS 9), the Board decided not to specify the order of accounting for lease modifications required by the reform and other lease modifications. This is because the accounting outcome would not differ regardless of the order in which an entity accounts for lease modifications required by the reform and other lease modifications.
